mapper.select: /* common.selectImageListCnt 고객사별 이미지 리스트 카운트 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CM_IMAGE_FILE WHERE 1=1

/* common.selectCorpInfoByUserId */ SELECT cu.CORP_ID , cc.CORP_NAME , cc.REGNO , cc.CEO_NAME , cc.BUSITYPE , cc.BUSICLASS , cc.WOPLACE_ADDRESS , cc.WOPLACE_ADDRESS_DETAIL , cc.WIRE_TEL , cc.FILE_ID , cc.DOMAIN_NAME FROM cm_console.CM_USER cu INNER JOIN cm_console.CM_CORP cc ON cu.CORP_ID = cc.CORP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN cm_console.CM_FILE_MGR cfm ON cc.FILE_ID = cfm.FILE_ID WHERE cu.USER_ID = #{userId}

/* common.selectImgUploadChSet - 이미지업로드 채널 설정 조회 */ SELECT CODE_VAL_1 AS CH , CODE_VAL_2 AS LIMIT_SIZE , CODE_VAL_3 AS RESIZE_WIDTH , CODE_VAL_4 AS RESIZE_HEIGHT FROM cm_bo.CM_CODE_TYPE CCT INNER JOIN cm_bo.CM_CODE CC ON CCT.CODE_TYPE_CD = CC.CODE_TYPE_CD AND CC.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE CCT.CODE_TYPE_CD = 'IMG_UPLOAD_CH_SET'
